title: Did the Russian official recommend not drinking for 42 days after the vaccination?
subtitle: The Sputnik V vaccine here is different from the vaccines approaching approval in the United States.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A Russian health official recommended that people who were vaccinated with Sputnik V Coffid 19 in Russia should refrain from drinking for two weeks before the first shot and 42 days after that.
